channel.title: Need help running client 508
channel.description: ok i had downloaded jdk 6 update 12 and i run my client and it says.....java is not recongized as an internal or external command operable program or batch file. press any key to continue..... please help i rlly wanna play a 508 server. :confused:

item.title: Need help running client 508
item.dc:creator: @x_power_x x power x
item.description:
@x_power_x wrote:

You have to edit your enviromental variables. Press properties on my computer>advanced>enviroment variables>

Edit the PATH and CLASSPATH to 1.6.0_12

YW

Read full topic
